No bigger #FriYay than this! Since March 17, employees from our Nutrition Services and Warehouse teams have been tirelessly serving free meals to our community. Today was the last day of our summer free meal program and we served more than 1.8 MILLION FREE MEALS to children and adults since March!🤩🙌 As a fitting conclusion to the program, employees served up a “thankful” meal to our community today by giving out turkey, potatoes, green beans, biscuits and gravy. Thank you to all of our employees who have served our community so well during this pandemic!!❤️❤️

During remote learning, families will be able to pick up meals at any of our 47 districtwide drive-through grab-and-go school locations. Free meals will be provided to students who qualify for free and reduced lunch. Low-cost meals will be available for all other APS students. For locations and pickup times, click here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SpCrvP3zD_42tgU8K1jy6kBjg_jd8bFQ/view

post_text: We thank Gateway High School alumnus Omar R. Lyle for sharing this tribute to Coach Jeff Sweet. The Olys recently named their athletic floor in the coach's honor. The "Jeff Sweet Court" has a nice ring to it! #OlyPride 🏀
shared_text:
Omar R. Lyle is feeling joyful with Jeff Sweet and Thomas Gilbert.
February 4 at 11:37 PM ·

I just want to say congratulations to a man that I truly appreciate being apart of my life in High School. Today Coach Jeff Sweet was given the honor of having Gateway High School's basketball court named after him (Jeff Sweet Court). Coach, you deserve this, but not just for being the winningest coach in Gateway history and leading it's best team to a 2000 Continental League Championship and the 2000 State Final Four, but for showing young kids what leadership looked like. Coach, I meant it when I said you got me ready for the Army.

Having good men and women (Mr. And Mrs. Sundine included) apart of your life at the right time can really make a difference in a young person's life. Thank you for the invite coach, your legacy will live on with in me, and the two little boys you saw sitting next to me tonight which by the way my oldest said he wants to see the videos of his dad dunking, because he doesn't believe half of the stuff people tell him 🤣. All jokes aside congratulations coach you truly deserve this!
